faqs.question: Should I inspect before buying a lakeside home in Azle?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Lakeside septic systems face unique challenges including proximity to the water supply, potential flood exposure, and higher environmental standards. faqs.question: What do inspectors look for at Azle lake properties?
faqs.answer: Key concerns include adequate setback from the lake, system capacity for intended use, drain field condition in sandy loam, erosion or flood damage, effluent quality, and compliance with environmental requirements. Older cabins converted to full-time residences receive special attention for capacity adequacy.
